statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT equipment_id, last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_interval FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_interval > 30 ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND maintenance_interval < 60;
SELECT equipment_id, last_maintenance_date, maintenance_interval FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE last_maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_interval < 50 ORDER BY maintenance_interval, last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_interval > 30;
SELECT * FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_interval < 10;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_notes FROM Maintenance_Log;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_interval < 30 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_interval >= 90;
SELECT e.equipment_id, e.equipment_name, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_notes FROM Equipment e JOIN Maintenance_Log m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id WHERE m.maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_interval FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance_logs FROM Equipment e JOIN Maintenance_Log m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id GROUP BY e.equipment_name HAVING total_maintenance_logs > 2;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment;
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_log;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id < 5;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule JOIN equipment ON maintenance_schedule.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id;
SELECT log_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_log ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, location FROM Equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM MaintenanceActivity WHERE activity_type = 'Inspection';
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM Equipment;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE log_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_type, activity_date, description FROM MaintenanceActivity WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, MaintenanceSchedule.start_date, MaintenanceSchedule.end_date FROM Equipment JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceSchedule.equipment_id;

SELECT MaintenanceLog.log_date, MaintenanceLog.technician_id, MaintenanceLog.status, MaintenanceActivity.activity_type FROM MaintenanceLog JOIN MaintenanceActivity ON MaintenanceLog.activity_id = MaintenanceActivity.activity_id;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, serial_number FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_interval FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT technician_name, maintenance_notes FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE equipment_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_interval > 30 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, serial_number FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_interval FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_interval < 15 ORDER BY maintenance_interval DESC;

SELECT MaintenanceLogs.log_id, MaintenanceLogs.maintenance_date, Equipment.equipment_name FROM MaintenanceLogs JOIN Equipment ON MaintenanceLogs.equipment_id = Equipment.equipment_id WHERE MaintenanceLogs.technician_name = 'John Doe';

SELECT MaintenanceLogs.log_id, MaintenanceLogs.maintenance_date, Equipment.equipment_name, Technicians.technician_name FROM MaintenanceLogs JOIN Equipment ON MaintenanceLogs.equipment_id = Equipment.equipment_id JOIN Technicians ON MaintenanceLogs.technician_name = Technicians.technician_name WHERE MaintenanceLogs.maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
